page.title: 04 The Orchard Park Centre
page.content: The Orchard Park Centre is the heart of the Estate. It is more than that. Lying on the southern edge of the Estate where it abutts the older North Hull Estate, it has become heart for the two{Council Housing Estates.} A huge supermarket store and another twelve or so smaller{convenience goods shops, plus an adjoining multi-purpose health clinic suggests a traders' bonanza. Especially as the estate housing office is within the block with no roads to cross. On top of this an open market sets up on a nearby lorry park once a week. Truely, it is thronged with shoppers and their young children at any time of any working day. But, alas, in the evenings and at weekends the steel shutters come down and it becomes the haunt of young people with little or nothing to do and nowhere to go.
